title: Account Swich
body: ok, so my old account was really laggy and glitchy, ( i know it was the account because i made a new one and its fine) and so, i was wondering if there was any way to transfer my Ip/Rp and champions and skins that i have purchased from my glitchy old account to my new account, is this possible? or will i either have to suffer the freezing in game, or lose all my stuff?

replies.body: "Glitches" or lag is not account related in any way, as those issues come from problems with the game files or connection. Regardless, we do not transfer content between accounts. I'd suggest just using the account where the content is already, and if you're having issues of any kind either myself here or my techies can help you in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
